alert.note: Alert for Carteret (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 27 at 4:22PM EDT until June 27 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Newport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Carteret County in eastern North Carolina... * Until 500 PM EDT. * At 422 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Sealevel to near Morehead City, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Morehead City, Newport, Harkers Island, North River, Sealevel, Marshallberg, Davis, Smyrna, Straits, Atlantic, Pine Knoll Shores, Harlowe, Otway, Wildwood, Williston, Open Grounds Farm, Stacy, Bettie, Michael J Smith Airport and Oceana Pier. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please send your reports of hail and/or wind damage, including trees or large limbs downed, by calling the National Weather Service office in Newport at 1-800-889-6889.
